name: Battle Ant
description:
It's a real time strategy game created in Unity engine. You can generate a map, choose it's size, difficulty level and number of ai players. Your task is to defeat them all by placing buildings for resources. Be carefull though! If You can't feed the colony it will swiftly die out.

 Bare that the project is still in early access and many things can and will change. I'm open for reviews and suggestions.
